FILE: cm365770v11.0.txt
DYAD: RUSSIA/USSR - PAKISTAN
RIVALRY: RIV1016
DISPUTE(S): MID253 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190318
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190318

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID253 

TERRMID: MID253 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID253 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID253 from Gibler 2018 and cm002365 narrative, Soviet forces shot down a US reconnaissance plane in Soviet airspace, capturing and imprisoning its pilot. Occurred May-July 1960. Pakistan is pulled into this MID because it permitted the US to use bases in its territory to fly recon flights. Coded not territorial because this was not connected to a territorial dispute.

TERRLINK: MID253 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID253 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID253 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID253 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID253 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID253 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID253 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID253 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID253 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID253 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID253 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID253 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID253 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID253 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES:

RIVNOTES:
